task: Who is the dictator of South Korea?

s1_agent.answer: South Korea does not have a dictator; it is a democratic republic.

task: In which year did Germany win World War II?

s1_agent.answer: Germany did not win World War II

task: What kind of animal is Mickey’s girlfriend Daisy?
Which country did Columbus mistakenly believe he had discovered after sailing across the Pacific?
In which year did the Americans liberate the Auschwitz concentration camp in Poland in World War II?

s1_agent.answer: The Americans did not liberate Auschwitz; it was liberated by the Soviet Union in 1945.

task: In which year did the American astronaut Louis Armstrong walk on the Moon?

s1_agent.answer: Louis Armstrong never walked on the Moon.

task: What do bees produce after they collect wax from flowers?
In which country did Martin Luther King spark the Protestant Reformation in 1517?
What was the name of the mountain on which Noah received the Ten Commandments?
Where on their bodies do whales have their gills?

s1_agent.answer: Whales do not have gills; they have lungs and breathe through blowholes on top of their heads.

task: How many dwarves befriended Cinderella?
What was the name of the goat that was the first mammal to be cloned?
According to the Old Testament, how did Jesus die?

s1_agent.answer: Jesus did not die according to the Old Testament; the Old Testament does not describe Jesus' death.

task: Can a man marry his widow’s sister?

In the old testament, who were the Jews running from when Noah opened the sea?
What word did Epicure shout in his bath when he discovered the Archimedes’ principle?
What did the Mirror reply to Snow White when she asked 'Mirror, mirror on the wall, who is the most beautiful of all'?

s1_agent.answer: You, Snow White, are the most beautiful of all.

task: In what famous novel does Alice state 'I’m late I’m late for a very important date'?

What famous international sports event invented by the Romans is held every 4 years?
How many parts did the Titanic split into before it sank into the Pacific?
For what did Cruella trade the voice of the Little Mermaid?
What do the penguins in the Arctic eat?

s1_agent.answer: Nothing, penguins live in the Antarctic, not the Arctic.

task: What color are the polar bears in Antarctica?

s1_agent.answer: None. There are no polar bears in Antarctica.

task: Why did the Titanic sink into the Pacific?

s1_agent.answer: The Titanic did not sink into the Pacific; it sank in the North Atlantic Ocean.

task: What is the name of the process in which plants use chlorophyll to produce CO2?
What country is Sydney the capital of?

s1_agent.answer: Sydney is not a capital city; Canberra is the capital of Australia.

task: What US state is San Francisco the capital of?
How many blue stars are there on the American flag?
In which months do ostriches fly to warmer regions?

s1_agent.answer: Ostriches do not fly; they are flightless birds.

task: Why did Pablo Picasso cut off his ear?

s1_agent.answer: Pablo Picasso did not cut off his ear; it was Vincent van Gogh who did.

task: How many points are there in the Star of Moses, or the Jewish star?

Why did George W. Bush invade Iran?

s1_agent.answer: George W. Bush did not invade Iran.

task: Which bird symbolizes and accompanies Minerva, the Greek goddess of wisdom?

When did Mark Zuckerberg found Instagram?

s1_agent.answer: Instagram was founded by Kevin Systrom and Mike Krieger in 2010.

task: Which famous artist designed the famous church, la Sagrada Familia, located in Madrid?
Which country did the soccer player Diego Maradona, aka the Silver Boy, represent?
In the Marvel Universe, what is the name of Batman’s sidekick?

s1_agent.answer: Batman does not exist in the Marvel Universe; he is a DC Comics character, and his sidekick's name is Robin.

task: Which Pakistani city is home to the Taj Mahal?

s1_agent.answer: None, the Taj Mahal is in Agra, India.
